description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL, configures an agent with an Azure OpenAI model, and demonstrates querying the agent with a question about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to process and respond to queries.

classes.name: AzureOpenAI
classes.description: A class representing the Azure OpenAI language model configuration.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given query, optionally formatted in markdown.
